_sText:
This has been an off and on project. I finally had the urge to finish this the other day, and so I did. This is the final version of mansion_twilight. Players now start outside on the streets. Shoot the padlock to gain access to the maze and find your way to the mansion before you become a zombie.

THINGS I HAVE ADDED/CHANGED:
Mausoleum/Church building.
Sewer system.
New player start.
Walls around the map.
Rain/Storm noises (Courtesy of Robtronic).
New room to the left of the mansion.
updated the attic.
All doors open backwards to allow barricade creation.
The light environment is a dim blue to give it that nighttime glow.
Some new texturing around the map.
